decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Pole specification document, TC-T1222WR HD-TV1 Full HD Vandal-Resistant IR Dome Camera specification document, four annotated photos received on 04/05/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The cameras hereby approved should be installed and operated in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998 in respect of the windows in flats 9 - 20 and 91 - 102 Nene Gardens and these shall be electronically masked.
description: Installation of a 4m high pole mounted camera overlooking the bin store.
